Our Toilet Rental Services

We provide complete sanitation solutions for events, construction sites, and special occasions across Kenya

Standard Unit

KSh 5,500/day

Our most popular option for events and construction sites

  • Includes dedicated attendant
  • Free toiletries (soap, tissue)
  • Air freshener system
  • Basic handwashing station
  • Ventilation system

VIP Unit

KSh 15,000/day

Premium option for weddings, corporate events and VIP guests

  • Includes dedicated attendant
  • Premium toiletries package
  • Air freshener
  • Luxury handwashing station with mirror
  • Interior lighting and ventilation
  • Spacious interior design
